org.numenta.nupic.network

Class ManualInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.network.ManualInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Inference

    public class ManualInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements Inference

    Abstraction used within the Network API, to contain the significant return values of all Layer inference participating algorithms.

    Namely:
    • Input Value
    • Bucket Index
    • SDR
    • Previous SDR
    • ClassifierResult
    • anomalyScore
    All of these fields are "optional", (meaning they depend on the configuration selected by the user and may not exist depending on the user's choice of "terminal" point. A "Terminal" point is the end point in a chain of a Layer's contained algorithms. For instance, if the user does not include an Encoder in the Layer constructor, the slot containing the "Bucket Index" will be empty.
    Author:
    David Ray
